column.name: identifier
column.description: A unique identifier for an entity.

column.name: redirect_uri
column.description: The URI to which the user is redirected after an OAuth authorization flow.

column.name: scopes
column.description: A collection of permission scopes that define the access rights of a token or user.

column.name: expirity_date
column.description: The expiration date and time for an OAuth authorization code, after which it cannot be exchanged for an access token.

column.name: user_identifier
column.description: A generic identifier for a user, which can be a reference, ID, or username.
